SectionBody.Text: Section 641.312 and the provisions of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as implemented by 29 C.F.R. s. 2560.503-1, relating to internal grievances, apply to all group health insurance policies issued under this part. This section does not apply to a group health insurance policy that is subject to the subscriber assistance program in s. 408.7056 or to the types of benefits or coverages provided under s. 627.6561(5)(b)-(e) issued in any market.
